verses.verse: You are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: you shall not <S%H1413>cut<s%> <S%H7760>yourselves<s%>, nor make any <S%H7144>baldness<s%> between your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead<s%>.

For you are a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> you to be a <S%H5459>peculiar<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto <S%H5971>himself<s%>, above all the nations that are <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H127>earth<s%>.
You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> any abominable <S%H8441>thing<s%>.
These are the <S%H929>animals<s%> which you shall <S%H398>eat<s%>: the <S%H7794>ox<s%>, the <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, and the <S%H5795>goat<s%>,

The <S%H354>hart<s%>, and the <S%H6643>roebuck<s%>, and the red <S%H3180>deer<s%>, and the wild <S%H689>goat<s%>, and the <S%H1788>pygarg<s%>, and the wild <S%H8377>ox<s%>, and the <S%H2169>chamois<s%>.

And every <S%H929>animal<s%> that <S%H6536>parts<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>, and <S%H8157>cleaves<s%> the <S%H8156>hoof<s%> into <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6541>claws<s%>, and <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%> among the <S%H929>animals<s%>, that you shall <S%H398>eat<s%>.

Nevertheless these you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of them that <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, or of them that <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H8156>cloven<s%> <S%H6541>hoof<s%>; as the <S%H1581>camel<s%>, and the <S%H768>hare<s%>, and the <S%H8227>coney<s%>: for they <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, but <S%H6536>divide<s%> not the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>; therefore they are unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.

And the <S%H2386>pigs<s%>, because it <S%H6536>divides<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>, yet chews not the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto <S%H398>you<s%>: you shall not eat of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, nor <S%H5060>touch<s%> their dead <S%H5038>carcass<s%>.
These you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of all that are in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>: all that have <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%>:
And whatever has not <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> you may not <S%H398>eat<s%>; it is unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.
Of all <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%>.
But these are they of which you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%>: the <S%H5404>eagle<s%>, and the <S%H6538>ossifrage<s%>, and the <S%H5822>ospray<s%>,
And the <S%H7201>glede<s%>, and the <S%H344>kite<s%>, and the <S%H1772>vulture<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>,
And every <S%H6158>raven<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>,
And the <S%H1323>owl<s%>, and the night <S%H8464>hawk<s%>, and the <S%H7828>cuckow<s%>, and the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>,
The little <S%H3563>owl<s%>, and the great <S%H3244>owl<s%>, and the <S%H8580>swan<s%>,
And the <S%H6893>pelican<s%>, and the gier <S%H7360>eagle<s%>, and the <S%H7994>cormorant<s%>,
And the <S%H2624>stork<s%>, and the <S%H601>heron<s%> after her <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and the <S%H1744>lapwing<s%>, and the <S%H5847>bat<s%>.
And every creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H5775>flies<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto <S%H398>you<s%>: they shall not be eaten.
But of all <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H5775>birds<s%> you may <S%H398>eat<s%>.

You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of any thing that dies of <S%H5038>itself<s%>: you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is in your <S%H8179>gates<s%>, that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4376>it<s%>; or you may sell it unto an <S%H5237>alien<s%>: for you are an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>. You shall not <S%H1310>boil<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H2461>milk<s%>.
You shall <S%H6237>truly<s%> <S%H6237>tithe<s%> all the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed<s%>, that the <S%H7704>field<s%> brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year<s%>.

And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which he shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H4643>there<s%>, the tithe of your <S%H1715>corn<s%>, of your <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and of your <S%H3323>oil<s%>, and the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> of your <S%H1241>herds<s%> and of your <S%H6629>flocks<s%>; that you may <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3117>always<s%>.

And if the <S%H1870>way<s%> be too <S%H7235>long<s%> for <S%H3588>you<s%>, so that you are not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H4725>it<s%>; or if the place be too <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3068>you<s%>, which the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3068>there<s%>, when the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> has blessed <S%H1288>you<s%>:

Then shall you <S%H5414>turn<s%> it into <S%H3701>money<s%>, and bind <S%H6696>up<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and shall <S%H1980>go<s%> unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>:

And you shall <S%H5414>bestow<s%> that <S%H3701>money<s%> for whatever your <S%H5315>soul<s%> lusts <S%H183>after<s%>, for <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, or for <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, or for <S%H3196>wine<s%>, or for strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>, or for whatever your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7592>desires<s%>: and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> there <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, <S%H1004>you<s%>, and your household,
And the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> that is inside your <S%H8179>gates<s%>; you shall not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H2506>him<s%>; for he has no part nor inheritance with <S%H5159>you<s%>.

At the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> all the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of your <S%H8393>increase<s%> the same <S%H8141>year<s%>, and shall lay it <S%H3240>up<s%> inside your <S%H8179>gates<s%>:

And the <S%H3881>Levite<s%>, (because he has no <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with <S%H1616>you<s%>,) and the stranger, and the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and the <S%H490>widow<s%>, which are inside your <S%H8179>gates<s%>, shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>; that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%> which you <S%H6213>do<s%>.
